blocks.text: Norway's biggest Champions League night ‚Äî Glimt host Inter Milan
Bod√∏/Glimt step onto European football's biggest stage tonight at Aspmyra. Meanwhile, Norway's Olympic gold machine rolls on ‚Äî Klaebo already in action this morning, biathlon relay this afternoon.
Bad news from the slopes: Sweden took cross-country team sprint gold, Norway off the podium. The biathlon relay at 14:45 is now a must-win for Norwegian pride.
